data.name: Message_AdvancedProfile
data.value:
Welcome again!
We are happy to introduce you a brand new version of BodyArchitect. We've added lots of new features and improvements, making the program more effectively in helping you with your training.
It is impossible to enumerate all the new features you'll find in the program. We hope you will start discovering things we have prepared for you. One of the biggest changes we want to mention is the introduction of three types of accounts: -Basic - free, functionally almost the same as the previous version -Premium - includes all the features of the program designed for a single user (without part for fitness instructors) -Instructor - the richest account, with all the options
Description of individual accounts can be found in the application. Basic account is free, while others require enough points (which you can buy). We have a special gift for you to thank you for being an active user of BodyArchitect. We give you 90 points which is enough to work with Premium account for 3 months.
Good luck

data.name: Message_FullWP7Profile
data.value:
Welcome again!
We are happy to introduce you a brand new version of BodyArchitect. We've added lots of new features and improvements, making the program more effectively in helping you with your training.
It is impossible to enumerate all the new features you'll find in the program. We hope you will start discovering things we have prepared for you. One of the biggest changes we want to mention is the introduction of three types of accounts: -Basic - free, functionally almost the same as the previous version -Premium - includes all the features of the program designed for a single user (without part for fitness instructors) -Instructor - the richest account, with all the options
Description of individual accounts can be found in the application. Basic account is free, while others require enough points (which you can buy). We have a special gift for you to thank you for buying a full version of BodyArchitect for WP7. We give you 180 points which is enough to work with Premium account for 6 months. In addition, all features from full version on WP7 will be working even on Basic account.
Good luck

data.name: Message_NormalProfile
data.value:
Welcome again!
We are happy to introduce you a brand new version of BodyArchitect. We've added lots of new features and improvements, making the program more effectively in helping you with your training.
It is impossible to enumerate all the new features you'll find in the program. We hope you will start discovering things we have prepared for you. One of the biggest changes we want to mention is the introduction of three types of accounts: -Basic - free, functionally almost the same as the previous version -Premium - includes all the features of the program designed for a single user (without part for fitness instructors) -Instructor - the richest account, with all the options
Description of individual accounts can be found in the application. Basic account is free, while others require enough points (which you can buy). At the start you get from us 30 points, which is sufficient to work on a Premium account for a one month.
Good luck
